headline: Organon Appoints Company Executive Joseph Morrissey as Interim CEO and Board Chair Carrie Cox as Executive Chair; Announces Results of Audit Committee Investigation
summary: JERSEY CITY, N.J., October 27, 2025--Organon (NYSE: OGN) ("Organon" or "the company") today announced that its Board of Directors has appointed the Company’s Executive Vice President and Head of Manufacturing & Supply, Joseph Morrissey, Interim Chief Executive Officer. Board Chair Carrie S. Cox will also take on additional responsibilities on an interim basis as Executive Chair to support Mr. Morrissey in his new role. Director Robert Essner will assume the role of Lead Independent Director.

raw.headline: Organon Appoints Company Executive Joseph Morrissey as Interim CEO and Board Chair Carrie Cox as Executive Chair; Announces Results of Audit Committee Investigation
raw.summary: JERSEY CITY, N.J., October 27, 2025--Organon (NYSE: OGN) ("Organon" or "the company") today announced that its Board of Directors has appointed the Company’s Executive Vice President and Head of Manufacturing & Supply, Joseph Morrissey, Interim Chief Executive Officer. Board Chair Carrie S. Cox will also take on additional responsibilities on an interim basis as Executive Chair to support Mr. Morrissey in his new role. Director Robert Essner will assume the role of Lead Independent Director.

headline: U.S. FDA Approves Updated Indication for WINREVAIR™ (sotatercept-csrk) in Adults with Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension (PAH, WHO* Group 1 Pulmonary Hypertension) Based on Phase 3 ZENITH Study
summary: RAHWAY, N.J., October 27, 2025--Merck (NYSE: MRK), known as MSD outside the United States and Canada, today announced that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has approved an update to the U.S. product label based on the Phase 3 ZENITH trial for WINREVAIR™ (sotatercept-csrk) for injection, 45mg, 60mg. WINREVAIR, an activin signaling inhibitor, is now FDA-approved for the treatment of adults with pulmonary arterial hypertension (PAH, WHO Group 1 pulmonary hypertension) to improve exercise
